apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this loving couple emoji portrays a man with medium-dark skin tone and a woman with dark skin tone, both rendered with Apple’s signature soft, rounded edges and realistic 3D shading. A vibrant, glowing heart hovers between them, its glossy surface catching light to convey deep affection and unity. The warm skin tones and gentle expressions on Apple’s devices create an inclusive representation of romantic connection and partnership.
